p: Series 7 showed moderate to weak cytotoxic activity on either or both cell lines, except for the N-benzylisatin hybrid 7 h which showed a potent cytotoxic activity on both cell lines with IC 50 of 4.32 and 1.72 µM on MCF-7 and T-47D, respectively. These results indicate that the N-substitution at the isatin nucleus greatly affects the cytotoxic activity in the newly synthesised compounds mostly in a negative manner ( Table 1).
